Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
drugstore \drugstore\ n. a retail shop where medicine and other articles are sold.
Syn: apothecary's shop, chemist's, chemist's shop, dispensary, pharmacy. [WordNet 1.5]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
chemist's \chemist's\ n. a retail shop where medicine and other articles are sold; a {drugstore}. [British]
Syn: drugstore, apothecary's shop, chemist's shop, dispensary, pharmacy. [WordNet 1.5]
drugstore n : a retail shop where medicine and other articles are sold [syn: {apothecary's shop}, {chemist's}, {chemist's shop}, {pharmacy}]
